page.title: 02BILLY SMART'S CIRCUS
page.content: Billy Smart was born in 1894 and he died in 1966.Billy Smart's has been a circus for 38 years. Before that Billy Smarts was a riding stable and Equestrian centre. An average "full house"could bring in 3,000 pounds.The cost of a ticket was Â£2 .There have been quite a few famous acts,The Flying Oscars,Moira Anderson,Bernie Winters,Johnny Hutch and the Half Wits,The Flying Ramos, and Robert Tassers Sealions. The payment of an act varies. The more difficult the act the more money, the artist would get on an average 500 pounds per week for thirteen performances.Billy Smart's has'nt had a single accident. The statue of Billy Smart was put up in 1975.In 1985 the Circus has gone for good.The buildings are now used for Car Boot Sale,storage& Commercials
